definition: Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
see 便宜|便宜[pian2 yi5]

sentences.english: If you want a glass of wine and an espresso, go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想再来杯红酒和咖啡，请便。

sentences.english: If you insist on leaving now, please go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要走，那就请便吧。

sentences.english: The children started in on the food without waiting for an invitation.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们不等人请便开始吃了起来。

sentences.english: 'Please yourself, ' said the old duck, and she went away.
sentences.chinese: “那就请便吧，”年老的客人说完就走了。

sentences.english: If you feel out of sorts, you may please yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感到不舒服，就请便吧。

sentences.english: Well, if you don't want to study, do as you please.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不想学习，那就请便吧。

sentences.english: As soon as the food was put on the table, all the children pitched in without waiting to be invited.
sentences.chinese: 食物一端上桌子，孩子们用不着请便大吃起来。

sentences.english: Well, please yourself, I don't mind what you do.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，请便，我不介意你所做的。

sentences.english: If they want to feed themselves head first into that meat grinder, let em.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们想要把他们的头送入绞肉机里，那么请便吧。
